title: Advice on Zed?
body:
Zed is My main and i play him half of the time.
Does anyone have any good skills or tactics to play with Zed?
Or any combos that take ultimate skill?

replies.body: [This](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xtCHRqr-jLU&list=PLUSnJ3s67h75aYRYjudxNGDN0_M7tatEo) is basically where everyone learns their Zed.
